channel.title: TRYOUTS
channel.description: Official Tryouts apps webpage on GitHub.

item.title: Project 1
item.description: SudokuPlus is a free Android game for handheld devices. It comes with a pleasant UI, save/load mechanics and hinting system. There are two color schemes to chose from. Game has english and polish version. Check Google Play for more information and download.

item.title: Project 2
item.description: calmNow app is under development at the moment. The goal of this app is to provide user with positive feedback at anytime necessary. Here are some examples. If you're having a panic attack, open the app and follow instruction to calm yourself. If you're just woke up and don't feel like getting up, open the app and identify yourself with the positive content that's inside. I think that this app will be different than usual how-to-meditate-and-think-positively kind of apps. As always, the app itself will be free.

item.title: Project 3
item.description: If you have an app idea, please, send me an e-mail! :)
